name: Smart Pregnancy Calculator
author: Hayat Developers | Pregnancy Calculator - Made for WordPress

sections.description:
Smart Pregnancy Calculator helps to calculate the pregnancy due date and conception date.

Features

  1. Estimate due date and conception date of the baby.
  2. Download results as pdf [Pro]
  3. Collect leads [Pro]

Short Code

[smart-pregnancy-calculator]
sections.installation:
Installation of the plugin is really simple.

  1. Install using one of these options:
    • Install directly from WordPress Admin panel: go to Plugins -> Add New -> Search for “Smart Pregnancy Calculator”, and click the Install button.
    • Download the ZIP manually from WordPress’ plugins repository, and upload it through WordPress Admin panel: go to Plugins -> Add New -> Upload Plugin, browse to the downloaded Zip and upload it.
    • Download the ZIP, extract it and manually upload the extracted folder through FTP to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. That’s it!
sections.faq:
Can I change theme of the forms?

Yes, you can customize theme in Pro version.

Can I capture leads?

Yes, you can collect leads in Pro version.
